name: XPO APP
slogan: A payment processing app that makes it easy and secure to pay instagram influencers
description: XPO is a payment processing app that makes it easy and secure to pay instagram influencers. Users can request and pay for influencers to promote their content through the app. Their payments will be held in a XPO wallet before, once both parties are satisfied the funds are released to the influencers. This makes it easy and secure to pay influencers. XPO. Simple. Secure. Promo.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Lotanna Ezeike
team.bioHtml: Founder XPO APP • Strong financial background. FORTNITE God • Worked at @BARCLAYS

jobs.title: CTO - Swift Expert - Mobile UI Designer
jobs.description:
- We are looking for a CTO to come onboard in our team
- We have raised £50K pre-seed which will give us a 7 month-run

XPO an app that allows you to securely pay instagram influencers with ease.

https://www.xpo-app.com
